page.title: 20PARISH RECTOR WICKERSLEY
page.content: It was surprising to find out what a rector does behind the scenes.His most important job is{to help people {understand God}more.He does 3 services on Sunday one at 8.30a.m., one at 10.30a.m.,one at 6.30p.m.and on average about 250 people attend them. He also does Funerals,Weddings and Baptisms.Last year,1984,he did 76 Funerals,31 Weddings and 37 Baptisms. Sermons for his services take about 6 hours to write and only 15 minutes to say.He is also responsible for the maintenance of the church and graveyard.{The Rev.Draper}is chairman of{St.Albans C.ofE.School Governors and also of{C.H.U.G.(Church {Unemployment Group)}which he helped to found.He works about{14 hours a day which includes pastoral work,administrative work and any meetings he has to attend.
